name: Beat Slam
description:
Beat Slam is a fun arcade gaming combining Reflex and Precision and simple one button controls

Download now and jump in this neon styled platformer where you need to slam on glowing pads to survive

How to Play:
◉ Tap to slam on the ground!
◉ Hold to enter slow motion!
◉ Timing and Precision are the keys to victory
◉ Try to get the same the color platform as your character to make a combos!
◉ Complete the challenges to unlock new Hats/Glasses
◉ Compare your highscore with players worldwide

Download now !!!
